page.title: 01Playford & Bealings Area
page.content: Area includes parish of Plyford, major part of parishes of Little and Great Bealings. Small parts of parishes of rushmere, Tuddenham, Culpho, Martlesham, kesgrave. Mainly rural area, situated between county town of Ipswich nd Woodbride, lying mainly north of original London-Great Yarmouth road. Served by minor roads in network of links between all the above villages and the rest of Suffolk. Area bisected by river Fynn, small tributary of River Deben. Landscape mainly flat with highest point only 40 metres above sea level. Villages seved surrounding farming communities in the past; now becoming commuter dormitories for Ipswich, Felixtowe Docks, British Telecom at Martlesham Heath and even London. Various farms grow crops, and some animals. Railfall is low.
